==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|収|益}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|しゅうえき}}

# [[profit]], [[earnings]], [[proceeds]], [[returns]]

====Derived terms====
{{top2}}
* {{l|ja|収益金}} (''shūekikin''): proceeds, earnings
* {{l|ja|収益性}} (''shūekisei''): profitability
* {{l|ja|収益率}} (''shūekiritsu''): earning rate
* {{l|ja|収益基盤}} (''shūeki kiban''): revenue base
* {{l|ja|収益報告}} (''shūeki hōkoku''): earnings report
* {{l|ja|収益成長率}} (''shūeki seichōritsu''): revenue growth rate
* {{l|ja|企業収益}} (''kigyō shūeki''): corporate earnings, corporate profits
{{mid2}}
* {{l|ja|経常収益}} (''keijō shūeki''): ordinary revenue, recurring income
* {{l|ja|年間収益}} (''nenkan shūeki''): yearly revenue
* {{l|ja|前受収益}} (''maeuke-shūeki''): deferred income
* {{l|ja|株価収益率}} (''kabuka shūekiritsu''): price-earnings ratio
* {{l|ja|四半期収益}} (''shihanki shūeki''): quarterly earnings
* {{l|ja|四半期収益発表}} (''shihanki shūeki happyō''): quarterly earnings announcement
* {{l|ja|税引き前収益}} (''zeibiki-sen shūeki''): pretax profit
